quotes.message: In case you never get a second chance: don't be afraid! And what if you do get a second chance? You take it!
quotes.name: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.message: Second chances do come your way. Like trains, they arrive and depart regularly. Recognizing the ones that matter is the trick.
quotes.name: Jill A. Davis

quotes.message: There are no second chances in life, except to feel remorse.
quotes.name: Carlos Ruiz Zafn

quotes.message: [When it comes to God] We can't run out of second chances...only time.
quotes.name: Robin Jones Gunn

quotes.message: We're given second chances every day of our life. We don't usually take them, but they're there for the taking.
quotes.name: Andrew M. Greeley

quotes.message: A second chance doesn't mean anything if you didn't learn from your first.
quotes.name: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.message: Having a second chance makes you want to work even harder.
quotes.name: Tia Mowry

quotes.message: If somebody is gracious enough to give me a second chance, I won't need a third.
quotes.name: Pete Rose

quotes.message: Sometimes giving someone a second chance, Is like giving them an extra bullet for their gun.. cause they missed you the first time.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Because this is what I believe - that second chances are stronger than secrets. You can let secrets go. But a second chance? You don't let that pass you by.
quotes.name: Daisy Whitney

quotes.message: Every moment of your life is a second chance.
quotes.name: Rick Price

quotes.message: We all deserve second chances, but not for the same mistake.
quotes.name: Thabiso Owethu Xabanisa

quotes.message: If you ever get a second chance in life for something, you've got to go all the way.
quotes.name: Lance Armstrong

quotes.message: A man deserves a second chance, but keep an eye on him.
quotes.name: John Wayne

quotes.message: God always offers us a second chance in life.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: If you are still breathing, you have a second chance.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: Don't think there are no second chances. Life always offers you a SECOND CHANCE... It's called TOMORROW.
quotes.name: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.message: I believe in second chances, but I don't believe in third or fourth chances.
quotes.name: Selena Gomez

quotes.message: People do make mistakes and I think they should be punished. But they should be forgiven and given the opportunity for a second chance. We are human beings.
quotes.name: David Millar

quotes.message: Every second a seeker can start over, For his life's mistakes Are initial drafts And not the final version.
quotes.name: Sri Chinmoy

quotes.message: You don't get second chances in the real world.
quotes.name: Gail Simmons

quotes.message: We all have big changes in our lives that are more or less a second chance.
quotes.name: Harrison Ford

quotes.message: Life always offers us a second chance. It's called tomorrow. So don't give up against adverse circumstances and keep fighting.
quotes.name: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.message: I don't buy idea of second chance. With hope we make a lot of chances.
quotes.name: Toba Beta

quotes.message: Thank God you are still alive for many have died and are dying as I speak. You still have the opportunity to change and make things right whilst those that have died wish for that second chance.
quotes.name: Aleksandr Sebryakov

quotes.message: Our GOD is a GOD of second chances - Yes, God does these things again and again for people.
quotes.name: Job 33:29

quotes.message: I will forever believe in second chances and forgiveness, because if it weren't for those two things I would and should be dead.
quotes.name: Dedrick D. L. Pitter

quotes.message: Every second we have a second chance to do something we haven't done yet. That's why it's called a second and not a first.
quotes.name: Robert J. Braathe

quotes.message: They say everyone needs a second chance, I am willing to give you one provided you are ready to accept it.
quotes.name: Nidhi Saini

quotes.message: Let Tomorrow be your second chance to prove that you are better than today and yesterday.
quotes.name: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.message: Children are our second chance to have a great parent-child relationship.
quotes.name: Laura Schlessinger

quotes.message: I've learned that making a 'living' is not the same thing as making a 'life. I've learned that life sometimes gives you a second chance. I've learned that you shouldn't go through life with a catcher's mitt on both hands; you need to be able to throw something back.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: Whatever problems we had back then don't exist anymore. It's why we have this second chance, and we can't throw it away.
quotes.name: Michelle Maddow

quotes.message: I was dying but suddenly had a second chance at living.
quotes.name: Shelley Fabares

quotes.message: Unfortunately, we don't get a second chance. We've already played them twice.
quotes.name: Trevor Brooking

quotes.message: When you're on the road, there's no time for second chances and messing yourself up.
quotes.name: Shaun Alexander

quotes.message: No second chances at a single moment.
quotes.name: Jeanette Winterson

quotes.message: Our God of Grace often gives us a second chance, but there is no second chance to harvest a ripe crop.
quotes.name: Kurt Von Schleicher

quotes.message: There is no going back in life, no return, no second chance. I cannot call back the spoken word or the accomplished deed.
quotes.name: Daphne du Maurier

quotes.message: All discarded lovers should be given a second chance, but with somebody else.
quotes.name: Mae West

quotes.message: We all make mistakes, everybody should be given a second-chance.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: I want the world to know that everybody deserves a second chance.
quotes.name: El Debarge

quotes.message: I mean we all need a second chance sometimes.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: There's nothing as exciting as a comeback ' seeing someone with dreams, watching them fail, and then getting a second chance.
quotes.name: Rachel Griffiths

quotes.message: Everybody deserves a second chance in this world. That's basically all I ask.
quotes.name: Shannen Doherty

quotes.message: Sometimes goodbye is a second chance.
quotes.name: Shinedown

quotes.message: Sometimes in life, you’re not always given a second chance, but if you do, take advantage of it, and go out with a bang!
quotes.name: Aquaria

quotes.message: Miracles were just second chances if you really thought about it — second chances when all hope was lost.
quotes.name: Kaya Mclaren

quotes.message: That is what life is about. We do not get redos, but we do get second chances.
quotes.name: Jeffrey Fry

quotes.message: Chance is not a word to toss in the air. It’s a word to take in, a word to give yourself.
quotes.name: Michelle Muriel

quotes.message: A second chance doesn’t mean you’re in the clear. In many ways, it is the more difficult thing. Because a second chance means that you have to try harder. You must rise to the challenge without the blind optimism of ignorance.
quotes.name: Ling Ma

quotes.message: Sometimes you don’t get a second chance. You need to take a chance when you have the opportunity. Always.
quotes.name: Gavin MacLeod

quotes.message: I have become convinced that God thoroughly enjoys fixing and saving things that are broken. That means that no matter how hurt and defeated you feel, no matter how badly you have been damaged, God can repair you. God can give anyone a second chance.
quotes.name: Melody Carlson

quotes.message: Sometimes you were handed a second chance, and all you had to do was close your eyes and step into it.
quotes.name: Jean Oram

quotes.message: But second chances aren't forever Even miracles have an expiration date.
quotes.name: Robyn Schneider

quotes.message: To take that second chance, we need to notice where we are and be open to the possibility of growing.
quotes.name: Holly Elissa Bruno

quotes.message: You don't need to wait for that second chance, because every second is a chance to change your life for the better.
quotes.name: Jeanette Coron

quotes.message: It has been said that sometimes the greatest hope in our lives is just a second chance to do what we should have done right in the first place.
quotes.name: Richard Paul Evans

quotes.message: Stop giving so many second chances. Wishing someone would be something they’re not is a waste of time and messes with your head. Truth hurts a lot sometimes... and I hate to be the one to break it to you, but in reality, you’re stressing and agonizing about ending a relationship they left a while ago.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: Stop giving so many second chances. Wishing someone would be something they’re not is a waste of time and messes with your head. Truth hurts a lot sometimes... and I hate to be the one to break it to you, but in reality, you’re stressing and agonizing about ending a relationship they left a while ago.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: Everyone needs a second chance. Some of us need a third or fourth chance.
quotes.name: Catherine DePasquale

quotes.message: Sometimes, some people and some situations deserve a second chance.
quotes.name: Germany Kent

quotes.message: There is always a chance for a new beginning.
quotes.name: Catherine DePasquale

quotes.message: Never come late to a party you were supposed to host. Second chances are rare. If you miss them... cry.
quotes.name: Lod Nael

quotes.message: No one can claim perfection, that's why everyone needs a second chance ad infinitum.
quotes.name: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.message: The thing about second chances is we always walk into them assuming we'll feel better, when nine times out of ten things get worse before the ever get better.
quotes.name: Rachel Van Dyken

quotes.message: The wonderful thing about second chances is that they exist.
quotes.name: Felice Stevens

quotes.message: Second chances appear like a gift left at our doorstep.
quotes.name: Holly Elissa Bruno

quotes.message: Choosing to be open to as many second chances as your heart can bear changes everything.
quotes.name: Holly Elissa Bruno

quotes.message: Being both able and willing to accept second chances when offered and to create or request second chances when they are not offered is the platform for a joyously fulfilling life.
quotes.name: Holly Elissa Bruno

quotes.message: Every second chance I have witnessed or experienced is a momentary miracle.
quotes.name: Holly Elissa Bruno

quotes.message: I will accept my second chance for a truer, simpler and more sacred life.
quotes.name: Holly Elissa Bruno

quotes.message: May your days abound with second chances and your heart be strong and vulnerable enough to choose the unseen and the unknown.
quotes.name: Holly Elissa Bruno

quotes.message: Second chance I do not fear the destination it is the journey that creates the image unclear.
quotes.name: R. William Standish

quotes.message: Can the lie you’ve lived before today—get one last second chance?
quotes.name: Kurt Philip Behm
